docs.lead_paragraph: Private equity firms have been rapidly buying up nursing homes in the last few years, sometimes using complex ownership structures to shield them from lawsuits. Now they have attracted attention in Washington.
docs.abstract: Private equity firms have been rapidly buying up nursing homes in the last few years, sometimes using complex ownership structures to shield them from lawsuits. Now they have attracted attention in Washington. Two members of the United States Senate on Thursday asked the federal agency that oversees nursing home inspections to account for what The [...]
